paper.title: SU-Î”CoVaR
paper.abstract: We have developed a measure for systemic risk under the bivariate S-U-normal distribution, and estimated systemic risk conditional upon the VaR of financial institutions. Simulation results show that both the normal and the guantile regression estimates are downward biased relative to the S-U-normal estimate for systemic risk. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

domain_result.justification: The paper focuses on developing a measure for systemic risk under a specific distribution and estimating systemic risk conditional upon the VaR of financial institutions. This directly pertains to the assessment and management of financial risks, particularly systemic risk, which is a key concern in financial risk management.
